commit.message:
c-incpath.c (add_path): Canonicalize paths to use '/' if HAVE_DOS_BASED_FILESYSTEM.

	* c-incpath.c (add_path): Canonicalize paths to use '/' if
	HAVE_DOS_BASED_FILESYSTEM.
